title: Google\Cloud\AutoMl\V1beta1\Document\Layout
name: Layout
description:
Describes the layout information of a [text_segment][google.cloud.automl.v1beta1.Document.Layout.text_segment] in the document.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.automl.v1beta1.Document.Layout

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.text_segment
params.description: Text Segment that represents a segment in [document_text][google.cloud.automl.v1beta1.Document.document_text].

params.name: data.page_number
params.description: Page number of the [text_segment][google.cloud.automl.v1beta1.Document.Layout.text_segment] in the original document, starts from 1.

params.name: data.bounding_poly
params.description: The position of the [text_segment][google.cloud.automl.v1beta1.Document.Layout.text_segment] in the page. Contains exactly 4 [normalized_vertices][google.cloud.automl.v1beta1.BoundingPoly.normalized_vertices] and they are connected by edges in the order provided, which will represent a rectangle parallel to the frame. The [NormalizedVertex-s][google.cloud.automl.v1beta1.NormalizedVertex] are relative to the page. Coordinates are based on top-left as point (0,0).
